mapper.sql: id, student_id, course_id, unit_id, vocabulary_id, word, word_chinese, fault_time, push, memory_strength, type
mapper.select: SELECT a.student_id, a.unit_id, a.fault_time, a.memory_strength, a.id capacityId, b.id, a.word, a.word_chinese, b.example_english, b.example_chinese, b.recordpicurl, b.sound_mark AS soundMark FROM simple_capacity a JOIN vocabulary b ON a.vocabulary_id = b.id AND b.delStatus = 1 AND a.memory_strength < 1.0 AND a.student_id = #{studentId} AND a.unit_id = #{unitId} AND a.push < #{date} AND a.type = #{type} ORDER BY push ASC

select a.id capacityId, a.unit_id, b.id, b.small_picture_url smallPictureUrl, b.middle_picture_url middlePictureUrl, b.high_picture_url highPictureUrl, b.word, b.word_chinese, b.example_english, b.example_chinese, a.memory_strength, a.fault_time, b.sound_mark AS soundMark from simple_capacity a JOIN vocabulary b ON a.vocabulary_id = b.id AND a.student_id = #{studentId} AND a.course_id = #{courseId} AND a.push < #{date} AND b.delStatus = 1 ORDER BY a.push, a.id desc LIMIT 1

select v.sound_mark soundMark, sc.word readUrl, sc.word content, sc.word_chinese chinese, sc.memory_strength memeoryStrength, sc.push pushTime from simple_capacity sc, vocabulary v where sc.vocabulary_id = v.id and v.delStatus = 1 and sc.student_id = #{stuId} and sc.course_id = #{courseId} and sc.type = #{type} and sc.memory_strength < 1 order by push asc
